Articles.Content:
I've started a new career mode in hard with a number of mods aimed an setting up a couple of large sustaining colonies and outposts. Come check it out, if you have an idea you would like me to try, just reply here or PM me.

http://spaceshackenterprises.blogspot.com/

With some good testing today for our engineers and contractors, we have finally grasped the ability to produce power from light, blessed be the gods. Come check out our progress.

Edited December 13, 2014 by gsamelon

SSE has made some progress, slow and steady. Contractors and Engineers have asked for some pretty benign tests until now. The mun is in site now that we have battery restoration capabilities for life support. Come check us out.
